title: Stephen Curry, Warriors fans featured in NBA's 'This Is Why We Play' campaign
text:
Stephen Curry, Warriors fans featured in NBA's 'This Is Why We Play' campaign FOX Sports 
Oct 13, 2015 at 2:49a ET + 
The NBA can't get enough its "It" player and team right now. Ezra Shaw/Getty Images Updated Oct 13, 2015 at 2:55a ET 
Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors are the NBA's hottest player and team, respectively, right now. 
To illustrate that, the NBA used both in its new "This Is Why We Play” campaign, which was released Monday. The ad depicts the vast emotions behind basketball’s universal appeal. 
Curry is featured twice in the video -- once as a child playing in the driveway and then again at the end of the video basking in champagne after winning the championship -- and the Warriors' crowd at the end celebrating during the Finals.
